sentences: See magus maitse meeldib mulle väga.
Tal on hea maitse rõivaste valimisel.
context: The Estonian word 'maitse' primarily refers to the sense of taste, the flavor of food/drink, or a person's palate or judgment regarding aesthetic matters. It can describe both physical perception (how something tastes) and metaphorical evaluation (good/bad taste in clothing, art, etc.).
